bay12: Gender Dwarf Fortress calls the functions that use this type to determine the pronouns for abstract_building, so it's not anything biology-related.
use same as NONE for now
using C-style escapes here as XML doesn't like having characters 11 and 12 in it, even if they're escaped this currently works fine due to how the headers are generated, but a different solution may be needed if the header generator is more robust in the future
